title: CCP closes foreign IPO loophole + Audiusâ€™ Roneil Rumburg: decentralized project crash course | E1273
description: First Jason covers the CCP banning US IPOs for big tech companies, closing the VIE loophole (1:50), then Audius Co-Founder Roneil Rumburg joins (18:44) to talk about his "decentralized SoundCloud," how decentralized crypto projects actually work for investors and executives, and more!
